title: March 28th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: March 28th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Bridgerton Season 2 Overview, Vanderpump Rules, Doja Cat & Oscars Drama
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from providing an overview of Season 2 of Bridgerton to discussing all the drama related to this years Oscars Aware Ceremony. See below for the topics of the week:


Bridgerton Season 2

  • Season 2 Overview + Thoughts
  • Booktok's Sentiment on the show's second season versus the book (The Viscount Who Loved Me by Julia Quinn)


Vanderpump Rules

  • Tom Schwartz and Katie Maloney Divorce Announcement


Doja Cat

  • Doja Cat quits music in viral tweet


Oscars Drama Update

  • Sean Penn calls for Oscars boycott if Ukraine’s Zelensky isn’t given a chance to speak
  • Rachel Zegler, the lead in “West Side Story”, Reveals She Didn’t get invited to the Oscars




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
